original_text: So Ananias went to Judas's house and he went inside. He put his hands on Saul and he said to him, ‘ Brother Saul, the Lord Jesus himself has sent me here to you. It was Jesus that you saw on the road when you were coming here to Damascus. He has sent me to you so that you will be able to see again. God will also fill you with his Holy Spirit.’
korean_text: 아나니아가 떠나 그 집에 들어가서 그에게 안수하여 이르되 형제 사울아 주 곧 네가 오는 길에서 나타나셨던 예수께서 나를 보내어 너로 다시 보게 하시고 성령으로 충만하게 하신다 하니

sentences.original_text: So Ananias went to Judas's house
He put his hands on Saul
the Lord Jesus himself has sent me here to you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 예수님께서 친히 저를 당신에게 이곳으로 보내셨습니다

sentences.original_text: It was Jesus that you saw on the road
when you were coming here to Damascus
He has sent me to you
so that you will be able to see again
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 다시 볼 수 있게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God will also fill you with his Holy Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 또한 당신을 그의 성령으로 채우실 것입니다
